containers.name: python
command: while sleep 3 && ! python3 -c 'import os;from gremlin_python.driver.client import Client;ip=os.getenv("frontend");graph_url = f"ws://{ip}:12312/gremlin"; username, password = "", ""; client = Client(graph_url, "g", username=username, password=password); ret = client.submit("g.V().limit(1)").all().result(); client.close();'; do echo -n .; done
